p: The soil analysis was conducted by Regional Chemical and Agricultural Station in Łódź according to the certified norms and procedures used in Poland. Soil pH KCl was measured using the potentiometric method according to the PN-ISO 10390:1997 norm. Total N was determined by the titrimetric Kjeldahl method (procedure PB 49 ed. 2) and N-NO 3 ‒ and N-NH 4 + were determined using the continuous flow analysis (CFA) coupled with spectrophotometric detection (procedure PB 50 ed. 1).
